ygData.subject: Re: Melifluous Motion -- another use
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes it does, works great in the outdoors. ... The whole party gets randomly teleported, in random directions/distances. ... Rokenn Swiftsong Master Brewer
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" <ReeceT@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Melifluous Motion -- another use
>Date: Wed, 23 Jun 1999 15:01:51 -1000
>
>From: "Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" <ReeceT@...>
>
>I don't have this song yet but I thought its primary utililty was an escape
>mechanism for the bard. For example, you are in a fight in which you are
>likely to die. You know its time to start running but first you sing the
>MM
>to teleport away from the creatures whacking you. This gives you a
>headstart against the mob and allows you to start singing Selos and equip
>your drum to assist your escape.
>
>Can someone confirm if MM assists in escaping from mobs in the manner I
>described?

Yes it does, works great in the outdoors.

> Also, if you are in a group, does it teleport everyone the same
>distance and direction or is it completely random for everyone?
>

The whole party gets randomly teleported, in random directions/distances.

>Galtin
>Bard and Master Brewer of E'ci
>


Rokenn Swiftsong
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Karana Server
